entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:27 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quebec Lesage Int'l Airport 11:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: NNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 8:49 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:49 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 8:49 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
